trans-unit.source: Indicates which condition should cause a Windows Forms application to shut down.
trans-unit.target: 어떤 조건 종료 하는 Windows Forms 응용 프로그램으로 인해 발생 해야 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: You can set the shutdown mode for an application through the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShutdownStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 통해 응용 프로그램에 대 한 종료 모드를 설정할 수는 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShutdownStyle%2A>속성.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShutdownStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A> method checks the value of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShutdownStyle%2A> property to determine if the application should shut down.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A>의 값을 확인 하는 메서드는 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShutdownStyle%2A>속성을 확인 하는 경우 응용 프로그램이 종료 됩니다.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.ShutdownStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ApplicationContext.OnMainFormClosed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Shut down only after the last form closes.
trans-unit.target: 마지막 폼이 닫힌 후에 종료 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Shut down when the main form closes.
trans-unit.target: 기본 폼이 닫힐 때를 종료 합니다.
